HelpImageText: Associe chaque image avec le texte correspondant
HelpDragAndDrop: Associe chaque concept avec sa définition
TopPage: Go to the top of the page
GamificationModalFinishWarning: If you continue, the gamification activity will close and the results will be displayed.
GamyCorrect: Gamy happy with a sign of success.
GamyWrong: Gamy sad with a sign of error.
accessible-dragdrop-text-action-check-ko: The answer entered is not correct.
accessible-dragdrop-text-action-move-err: Excuse me, I didn't understand which elements you want to move.
accessible-dragdrop-text-action-unknown: Excuse me, I didn't understand you.
accessible-dragdrop-text-action-repeat: This is a matching question. The choices to be matched are: {{options}}. The current option is {{current}}. You can update your selection by using the next and previous commands. You can know the current selection by using the current command. After selecting an option, you will be given a list of posible candidates and further instructions. When you are finished, say check to verify if your solution is correct. You can repeat this message by pressing the enter key and then giving the repeat command.
accessible-dragdrop-move-ok-aria-label: Option {{optionIndex}}: {{option}}. Matched with definition {{definitionIndex}}: {{definition}}, press to update.
accessible-dragdrop-move-ko-aria-label: Option {{optionIndex}}: {{option}} cannot be matched with definition {{definitionIndex}}: {{definition}}.
accessible-dragdrop-help-text: Current option {{optionIndex}}: {{option}}. {{content}} The possible definitions are: {{definitions}}. Say information if you need help.
accessible-dragdrop-modal-description: Select from the following options the one you consider appropriate:
tta-info-schema:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Click: initialises the schema.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-image:
Accepted voice commands:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Click: shows the text of the image.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-truefalse:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Check: checks your answers.
  • Click: changes the status of the current option.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects option number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next option.
  • Previous: selects the previous option.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-modal:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Click: opens the modal window.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-imagesound:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects image number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next image.
  • Pause: pauses the audio associated with the image.
  • Play: plays the audio associated with the image.
  • Previous: selects the previous image.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
  • Stop: stops the audio associated with the image.
tta-info-couples:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Check: (in gamified activity) sends your answers.
  • Click: marks an element to match.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects element number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next element.
  • Previous: selects the previous element.
  • Reset: (in gamified activity) resets the state of the widget.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-containertest:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Click: activates the current option.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects the first option in option group number X.
  • Next: selects the next option.
  • Previous: selects the previous option.
  • Check: checks your answers.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-chooseoption:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Click: chooses the current option.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • Go to number X: selects option number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Next: selects the next option.
  • Previous: selects the previous option.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-audioterm:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Play: plays the audio.
  • Pause: pauses the audio.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
  • Stop: stops the audio.
tta-info-video:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Maximize: maximizes the video.
  • Minimize: minimizes thre currently maximized video.
  • Play: plays the video.
  • Pause: pauses the video.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
  • Stop: stops the video.
tta-info-login:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Click: submits the form.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • Erase: cleans the previously written text in the input.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Type [text]: writes [text] into the input.
tta-info-global:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Accessibility: displays the accessibility menu.
  • Click: activates the currently selected voice-controlled widget.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages.
  • End: ends voice recording.
  • Go to number X: selects voice-controlled widget number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next voice-controlled widget.
  • Previous: selects the previous voice-controlled widget.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
  • Start: scrolls to the start of the page.
tta-info-hangman:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Write [text]: makes a new attempt with the letter [text].
  • Reset: resets the state of the activity.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-missing-word:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Check: checks your answers.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • Delete: deletes the content of the text box of the selected sentence.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects sentence number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next sentence.
  • Previous: selects the previous sentence.
  • Reset: resets the state of the activity.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
  • Write [text]: writes [text] in the text boxes that constitute the current word.
tta-info-correct-word:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Check: checks your answers.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • Delete: deletes the content of the currently selected word.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects word number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next word.
  • Previous: selects the previous word.
  • Reset: resets the state of the activity.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
  • Write [text]: writes [text] in the text boxes that constitute the current word.
tta-info-sentence-order:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Check: checks your answers.
  • Click: if the current element contains a word, selects it. Otherwise, it moves the currently selected word to the current element.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: moves to the sentence number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next element.
  • Previous: selects the previous element.
  • Reset: resets the state of the activity.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-match-columns-options:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Check: checks your answers.
  • Click: moves the current term to the selected target.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages, dropdowns and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects target number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Match with number X: matches the current term with column number X.
  • Next: selects the next target.
  • Previous: selects the previous target.
  • Reset: resets the state of the activity.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-match-columns-terms:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Check: checks your answers.
  • Click: opens a dropdown menu of possible targets.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages, dropdowns and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects term number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Match with number X: matches the current term with column number X.
  • Next: selects the next term.
  • Previous: selects the previous term.
  • Reset: resets the state of the activity.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-accordion-tabs:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Click: shows the region associated with the current selection and switches to content navigation mode.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects drop-down element number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next drop-down element.
  • Previous: selects the previous drop-down element.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-accordion-region:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Back: switches to navigation tab mode.
  • Click: activates the current widget to be voice-controlled.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: switches to navigation tab mode.
  • Go to number X: selects voice-controlled widget number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next voice-controlled widget.
  • Previous: selects the previous voice-controlled widget.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-horizontal-tabs-tabs:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Click: shows the content of the currently selected tab and switches to content navigation mode.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects tab number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next tab.
  • Previous: selects the previous tab.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-horizontal-tabs-region:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Back: switches to tab navigation mode.
  • Click: activates the current widget to be voice-controlled.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: switches to tab navigation mode.
  • Go to number X: selects voice-controlled widget number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next voice-controlled widget.
  • Previous: selects the previous voice-controlled widget.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-button-text-tabs:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Click: shows the content of the currently selected image and switches to content navigation mode.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects image number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next image.
  • Previous: selects the previous image.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-button-text-region:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Back: switches to tab navigation mode.
  • Click: activates the current widget to be voice-controlled.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: switches to tab navigation mode.
  • Go to number X: selects voice-controlled widget number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next voice-controlled widget.
  • Previous: selects the previous voice-controlled widget.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-drag-drop:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Check: checks your answers.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects option number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Match with number X: matches the selected option with the concept whose position is X.
  • Next: selects the next option.
  • Previous: selects the previous option.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-puzzle-options:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Check: checks your answers.
  • Click: moves the current piece to the selected target.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages, dropdowns and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects target number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Match with number X: matches the selected piece with the area numbered as X.
  • Next: selects the next target element.
  • Previous: selects the previous target element.
  • Reset: resets the state of the activity.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-puzzle-terms:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Check: checks your answers.
  • Click: opens a dropdown to move the currently selected piece.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages, dropdowns and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects piece number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Match with number X: matches the selected piece with the area numbered as X.
  • Next: selects the next piece.
  • Previous: selects the previous piece.
  • Reset: resets the state of the activity.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
tta-info-animation:
Accepted voice commands:
  • Click: shows the image associated to the currently selected region.
  • Close: closes the currently open information messages and modal windows.
  • End: ends the emission of voice commands to this widget.
  • Go to number X: selects region number X.
  • Help: displays this message.
  • Next: selects the next region.
  • Previous: selects the previous region.
  • Reset: resets the state of the animation.
  • Scroll down: scrolls down the page.
  • Scroll up: scrolls up the page.
